content: the st just worked and the next st and k tfl finishing by working step 1 through the last remaining judy s magic cast on front st then step 3 through the last remaining back st make a slip knot and place the loop around one of the a visual tutorial for the kitchener stitch can be found at needles the anchor loop will count as the first st hold https //tutorials knitpicks com/kitchener-stitch/ abbreviations approx approximately k-wise knitwise repeat repeat ssp slip slip purl these bobble bind off lh left hand rev st st reverse stockinette 2 stitches together bor beginning of round m marker stitch through back loop cn cable needle m1 make one stitch rh right hand sssk slip slip slip knit c 1 2 color 1 2 m1l make one left- round s round s these 3 stitches cc contrast color leaning stitch rs right side together cdd centered double m1r make one right- skip skip st st stockinette stitch decrease leaning stitch sk2p slip 1 knit two st s stitch es co cast on mc main color stitches together tbl through back loop cont continue p purl pass slipped stitch tfl through front loop decrease decrease es p2tog purl 2 stitches over the knit two decrease together dpn s double pointed together together stitch w&t wrap & turn see needle s pm place marker skp slip knit pass specific instructions increase increase pfb purl into the front slipped stitch over in pattern k knit and back of stitch sl slip we work even k2tog knit two stitches psso pass slipped stitch sm slip marker ws wrong side together over ssk slip slip knit these wyib with yarn in back kfb knit into the front pu pick up 2 stitches together wyif with yarn in front and back of stitch p-wise purlwise yo yarn over
